activities.name: Lake Skadar Panoramic Boat Tour to Kom Monastery
activities.description: Join us for an unforgettable sightseeing boat tour from the charming townlet of Virpazar, nestled right within the heart of Lake Skadar. Explore the stunning beauty of this magnificent lake and visit the medieval Kom Monastery. Set sail on a traditional wooden boat known as čun, and let your guide reveal the hidden gems of the region. Indulge in delicious local wine and take in the breathtaking scenery. Come and join us for an adventure of a lifetime! Experience the breathtaking sight of Vranjina's two majestic peaks as you sail through a narrow river canal. Admire Lesendro, the Key of Lake Skadar, an 18th-century structure where birds often perch atop the ruins. Discover the hidden beauty of three islands adorned with thousands of water lilies next, just before arriving at the medieval monastery Kom. Perched atop Odrin Hill, this hidden gem is accessible only by boat and is home to the best-preserved frescoes in the area. Immerse yourself in the sweet aroma of wild thyme during your 30-minute visit. Finally, enjoy a refreshing swim in the pristine waters of Lake Skadar, and take in the picturesque views of the untouched nature that surrounds you on the way back.
included: Sightseeing boat trip from Virpazar to Kom Monastery
excluded: National park entry fee (€5 per person, free for children under 15 years)

items: Although the cost of meals are not included in the tour, meals can be arranged by the activity provider, and paid for at your own expense, if you contact the activity provider a few days in advance to make arrangements During the summer, Montenegro has constant traffic jams, so be sure to plan your journey to Virpazar early and give yourself enough time to find parking
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Lake Skadar Wilderness Boat Trip
activities.description: Uncover the captivating beauty of Lake Skadar on a boat tour. Dive into crystal-clear waters, spot diverse bird species, sip on local wine, and admire the grandeur of Fort Lesendro.

items: Not recommended for individuals with mobility issues
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Private Guided 2-Hour Lake Skadar Boat Tour
activities.description: A guided 2-hour boat tour to explore the wild beauty of Skadar Lake. The area is rich with different bird species, carpets of lotus flowers, fishing villages, fortresses, and beaches.

items: Not recommended for individuals with mobility issues or heart problems
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Blue Cave and Bay of Kotor Day Trip by Boat
activities.description: Join a private or small-group boat tour through Boka Bay on a day trip from Kotor. Explore the Blue Cave and visit the iconic Our Lady of the Rocks island with an experienced skipper.
included: Skipper as a tour guide and driver
excluded: Entrance to Our Lady of the Rocks Museum

items: Not recommended for pregnant women or individuals with back problems
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.description: Enjoy a 3 to 3.5-hour stand up paddle board or kayaking guided tour along the amazing Budva bay with beautiful coastal caves and get a view of the 2500-year-old Budva Old Town.

items: Suitable for beginners and experienced riders
Weight limit: 220 lbs (100 kg) per rider
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Paragliding Experience
activities.description: Experience one of the most exciting adventure sports and enjoy some spectacular views. Take part in a tandem flight paragliding experience at Budva or Petrovac.

activities.name: Bay of Kotor and Blue Cave Speedboat Tour
activities.description: Explore the beauty of the Montenegrin coast on a speedboat tour. Discover the Bay of Kotor and swim in the Blue Cave, followed by a visit to Our Lady of the Rocks island.

items: This tour involves walking on uneven surfaces and climbing steps, so it may not be suitable for individuals with mobility issues. The tour will operate rain or shine, so please dress accordingly.

activities.name: Scenic Panoramic Flight
activities.description: Experience the diverse Montenegrin scenery from a unique perspective. Take a thrilling flight from Podgorica and admire the sights of vineyards, Skadar Lake, and the towns of Virpazar and Vranjina.

items: This tour involves walking on uneven surfaces and climbing steps, so it may not be suitable for individuals with mobility issues. The tour will operate rain or shine, so please dress accordingly.

activities.description: Experience the Bay of Kotor from a unique perspective, get away from the crowds and head into a fun sea adventure. Explore the coastline around Kotor, the nearby fishing villages and beaches on a guided kayak tour. No experience is required.

items: Participants must be at least 7 years old and in good physical condition. The rafting trip is subject to weather conditions and water levels; in case of cancellation due to unsafe conditions, an alternative activity or full refund will be offered.

activities.description: Visitors, nature lover and hikers, if you are looking for something more than Black lake to see, during the visit of NP Durmitor, and not looking for some climbing and too long hiking distance. Our offer may be the perfect choice for you

activities.description: White water Tara River rafting tour from Zabljak town(possible to arrange the transportation from another cities for additional fees) and optional Zip line over the Tara River canyon by the bridge of Djurdjevica Tara. Experience for memories. Transportation form Zabljak, rafting equipment, instructor, lunch in the camp included in the price. Zip line and drink are not included in the price.

activities.name: Vinarija Kopitovic
activities.description: Kopitovic family settled in the village of Donji Brceli in Crmnica in the 15th century. We have a long history of grapevine cultivation, especially types like Vranac and Kratosija. Vineyards are situated in ideal altitude above the sea level exposed to the sun during many days of the year. Old cellar is part of our winery and is over 300 years old. Also we built new degustation room in authentic style.

items: Minimum age for this activity is 12 years old
Participants must weigh between 30 and 120 kg
This activity is not recommended for pregnant women or individuals with heart or back problems
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Museum of King Nikola
activities.description: The Museum of King Nikola, a historic treasure trove, showcases the life and reign of Montenegro's last monarch, offering a unique journey through time and history.

items: This tour is suitable for participants with a moderate level of fitness
The tour will take place rain or shine, so please dress accordingly
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Njegos Mausoleum
activities.description: Exactly 461 stairs lead to Jezerski Vrh, which is located at an altitude of 1660 m above sea level, where the Mausoleum dedicated to Petar II Petrovic Njegos was opened in 1974, making it the mausoleum at the highest altitude in the world at the time. The location of today's Mausoleum housed a humble chapel which Njegos constructed in 1845 to be his eternal resting place.

items: Minimum age for this activity is 12 years old
Participants must know how to swim
This activity is not recommended for pregnant women or individuals with heart or back problems
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Art Museum of Montenegro
activities.description: Explore the rich artistic heritage of Montenegro at its premier art museum, showcasing both traditional and contemporary works.

items: Minimum age for this activity is 8 years old
Maximum weight for participants is 100 kg
This activity is not recommended for pregnant women or individuals with heart or back problems
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Ski Centar Kolasin 1600
activities.description: Kolasin 1600: Breathtaking summer mountain adventures - hiking, biking, and scenic chairlift rides.

activities.description: You are ready to experience an incredible experience of chasing horses in the intact wilderness of Montenegro. Our adventure lasts for several hours to a few days it all depends how adventurous you are.

activities.name: Adventure Park
activities.description: Experience thrilling fun and outdoor activities at Ivanova Korita Adventure Park!.

The yacht has a capacity limit, so early booking is recommended

activities.name: Ka'banya Kitesurf Beach
activities.description: Ka'banya kite center is a kitesurfing school and wake boarding station. This is a place where you can enjoy one of the Montenegro's most beautiful beaches and experience good quality kitesurfing. Ka'banya also includes a beach bar and a restaurant to satisfy all your needs. At evenings you can enjoy beautiful sunsets, camp fire and a taste of local barbecue and at night its party time! We have everything, come and see for your self.

items: Participants must be at least 18 years old to take part in wine tasting
Please inform the tour provider of any dietary restrictions or allergies in advance

activities.name: Wine and food tasting in the traditional winery
activities.description: Discover the flavors of Montenegro as you explore a traditional winery that has been around for 14 generations on this tasting tour.

items: This tour is subject to weather conditions; in case of cancellation due to bad weather, you will be offered an alternative date or a full refund
The hiking difficulty is moderate; participants should be in good physical condition
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Lady of the Rocks and Blue Cave - Kotor Boat Tour
activities.description: The Bay of Kotor—also called Boka—offers up islets, caves, and more. This boat tour lets you experience its highlights more easily and scenically than traveling by hire car or public transport. Prebook to secure your seat, and visit the Our Lady on the Rocks island church, a Soviet-era submarine base, and the Blue Grotto, to swim in its neon-blue waters. A choice of departures provides important flexibility.

items: This tour is suitable for all levels of experience, including beginners
In case of cancellation due to bad weather, you will be offered an alternative date or a full refund
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Herceg Novi: Scuba Diving for Beginners in the Adriatic Sea
activities.description: Explore the underwater world of the Adriatic Sea on this scuba diving adventure for beginners in Herceg Novi. No experience is necessary, as you'll be guided by a certified instructor who will teach you the basics of scuba diving and ensure your safety throughout the experience. Discover colorful marine life, ancient shipwrecks, and vibrant coral reefs as you dive into the crystal-clear waters. This unforgettable underwater adventure is perfect for those looking to try something new and exciting.
excluded: Photos and videos of the experience (available for purchase)

items: Participants must be at least 10 years old
Medical clearance is required for individuals with pre-existing medical conditions
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Kotor Old Town Walking Tour
activities.description: Get to know the Old Town of Kotor on this walking tour. Learn about the walled city’s history, architecture, culture.

items: This tour operates in all weather conditions; please dress appropriately
Participants must be at least 18 years old to consume alcohol

activities.description: Experience the Bay of Kotor from a unique perspective, get away from the crowds and head into a fun sea adventure. Explore the coastline around Kotor, the nearby fishing villages and beaches on a guided kayak tour.

activities.name: Kotor Boat Tour
activities.description: Discover the cultural and natural delights of Montenegro on a 2.5-hour sightseeing cruise from Kotor.

Participants should be able to swim

activities.name: Unique lunch experience with locals in high hills above Budva!
activities.description: Explore the area around Budva and have a local experience on this private tour. Depart from Budva in an air-conditioned vehicle and head into the hills to take in views of Budva from above. Visit Kosmac Fortress and Stanjevici Monastery and stop at a local familys home to eat a lunch made with fresh-grown ingredients.
excluded: Entry fees to Our Lady of the Rocks museum

items: This tour is subject to weather conditions
Children must be accompanied by an adult
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Home made wine, brandy and food tasting
activities.description: Our winery is located in Limljani, a village with 365 springs of natural clean water, full of vineyards and homemade ecological products, from where you can easily travel to the seaside, lake and mountains. In our gardens we have planted vegetables: onions, potato, paprika, tomato, carrots, blue tomato.. We offer you pleasant stay and relaxation, good fun and tasting of our homemade wines, liqueurs, juices and teas in our winery made in ethno style. Winery is situated 10m from the natural spring water, coming from mountain Sutorman. There is a table with seats where we serve food and drinks.

items: This tour operates rain or shine
Not recommended for guests with limited mobility
This tour is not wheelchair accessible

activities.name: Bike tour - Panoramic downhill from Njeguši trough Kotor serpentines
activities.description: The most amazing cycling tour in Montenegro offers unique view of Kotor. Tour begin by car transfer uphill trough serpentine road which is built in 19th century by Austrians. This road is 25km and it has 25 curves with stunning view on Kotor Bay and it takes around 45 minutes to our starting position at village Njegusi. It is settled bellow Lovcen mountain at 900 meters above sea level and there is born place of our greatest ruler Njegos the II. Taking a bikes and short ride trough the village allows you to understand how people here used to live time ago. Keep cycling for 2km light uphill brings us to the Krstac pass where you can try ZIPLINE 400 meters long. Later on at Horizont restaurant you would have a coffee break enjoying the most beautiful view ever. After break, starts downhill cycling for about 1.30h. Having fun and taking amazing photos from every curve with different perspective will make this journey unforgettable. This is regular road also used by car, so be careful.

items: You must be at least 18 years old to participate in the wine tasting
Please inform the tour operator in advance of any dietary restrictions or allergies

activities.name: 1-Hour Guided Lipa Cave Adventure in Montenegro
activities.description: Explore the natural rock formations in Lipa Cave with ease on this group tour with a guide. Take a train ride to the entrance and descend into the cool underground chamber. Learn about Lipa Cave’s place in Montenegrin history from your guide. Admire the underground river and geological formations as you walk the length of the cave.

items: The tour is conducted in English
This tour is not recommended for people with mobility issues
This tour is not wheelchair accessible
